title: #92 - Hotline Edition: How to Communicate with a Partner with Louie Felix
description:
This week on the hotline, you’re getting not one, but TWO matchmakers to answer your questions!

Joining Maria on this week’s episode is her work husband, the Chief Operating Officer and Matchmaker at Agape Match, Louie Felix! 

Louie Felix is matchmaking industry leader. His corporate startup and acquisition background brought him to the forefront of the relationship industry when he was contracted for the acquisition for a high end Beverly Hills-based matchmaking company. From there, he went on to serve as the CEO of two of the country’s largest matchmaking companies, as well as simultaneously acquiring and running the largest dating company in California. With these ventures, Louie has been responsible for the successful matchmaking efforts of more than 50,000 clients worldwide. 

Sign up for a Dating Assessment with Louis at https://calendly.com/felix-louie/dating-assessment 

Find Louie on Instagramhttp://instagram.com/louiefelix

To be on an upcoming episode to ask a question, make sure to follow Maria on insta to know when the hotline will be open next! http://instagram.com/matchmakermaria
author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
